titleStmt.title: The history of Cang-Hy, the present emperour of China pesented [sic] to the Most Christian King / by Father J. Bouvet, of the Society of Jesus and missionary into China.
Histoire de l'empereur de la Chine. English
titleStmt.author: Bouvet, Joachim, 1656-1730.
Crull, J. (Jodocus), d. 1713?

notesStmt.note: Translated by Jodocus Crull in his Present condition of the Muscovite empire, with the life of the present emperour of China by Father J. Bouvet. 1699. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
